basic.floral_language:
Anacampseros rufescens f. variegata
Floriography: unique, perseverance, beautiful
Has a beautiful shape and green oval leaves, silk-like hairs grow between leaves, in a cool season with abundant sunlight, leaves are closely arranged, may turn pink, very charming, high ornamental value. 
Likes sunshine, avoid long exposure under direct strong sunlight, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, place under bright scattered light. Flowers sometimes, pink color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, pink flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny leaf color turning to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, avoid prolonged strong light, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
